  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2963</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Jerusalem Day</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jerusalem Tag</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jour de Jérusalem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dia De Jerusalem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giorno De Gerusalemme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ημέρα της Ιερουσαλήμ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Día De Jerusalén</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A online unit about Jerusalem day, about the city Jerusalem and its history,, includes songs, facts about the wetsern walls, the gates and other landmarks</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">foreign language</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">history</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">culture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Jerusalem</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Onlinemaßeinheit über Jerusalem Tag, über
die Stadt Jerusalem und seine Geschichte, enthält Liede, Tatsachen 
über die wetsern Wände, die Gatter und andere Grenzsteine</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une unité en ligne au sujet de jour de 
Jérusalem, au sujet de la ville Jérusalem et de son histoire, inclut
des chansons, des faits sur les murs wetsern, les portes et d'autres 
bornes limites</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma unidade em linha sobre o dia de Jerusalem, 
sobre a cidade Jerusalem e seu history, inclui canções, fatos sobre 
as paredes wetsern, as portas e outros marcos</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'unità in linea circa il giorno de 
Gerusalemme, circa la città Gerusalemme e la relativa storia, include
le canzoni, i fatti circa le pareti wetsern, i cancelli ed altri 
limiti</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια σε απευθείας σύνδεση μονάδα για την ημέρα της 
Ιερουσαλήμ, για την πόλη Ιερουσαλήμ και την ιστορία της., 
περιλαμβάνει τα τραγούδια, τα γεγονότα για τους wetsern 
τοίχους, τις πύλες και άλλα ορόσημα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una unidad en línea sobre el día de Jerusalén,
sobre la ciudad Jerusalén y su historia, incluye canciones, hechos 
sobre las paredes wetsern, las puertas y otras señales</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fremdsprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kultur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
